title: Kombinat-Typefounders
content:
Since 2001 this has been the platform on which [Hannes Famira](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203444/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hannes%20Famira) and friends offer a retail library of fonts and customizing services.

[www.kombinat-typefounders.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204203444/http:/www.kombinat-typefounders.com/)
author: Hannes Famira
